channel.title: intrinsics on 杰哥的{运维,编程,调板子}小笔记
channel.description: Recent content in intrinsics on 杰哥的{运维,编程,调板子}小笔记

item.title: 轶事一则
item.description: 7.31 号周六的时候，发现 Intel Intrinsics Guide(https://software.intel.com/sites/landingpage/IntrinsicsGuide/) 出现错误，加载数据失败，于是在 Intel 的网站上提交了一个 bug。 8.2 号的时候，Intel 发邮件过来，说已经复现了问题，已经汇报给了后端团队。邮件原文： Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have verified and encountered the same issue. Please know that we have escalated this issue to our backend technical team. We will get back to you as soon as we have an update. Have a nice day ahead! 8.4 号的时候，Intel 再次发邮件过来，说后端团队正在处理这个问题，会尽快完成修复，请我耐心等待。这个时候我去网站上看，还是有问题。邮件原文： Our backend team is still working on this issue.
